Let \w my|strong="H3615"\w* \w fugitives|strong="H5080"\w* \w stay|strong="H1481"\w* \w with|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*; \w be|strong="H1933"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* refuge \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w destroyer|strong="H7703"\w*.” \w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* oppressor \w has|strong="H3588"\w* \w gone|strong="H8552"\w*, \w destruction|strong="H7701"\w* \w has|strong="H3588"\w* \w ceased|strong="H3615"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w oppressors|strong="H7429"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* vanished \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w*,

\w We|strong="H8085"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w of|strong="H1347"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*’s pomposity, \w his|strong="H8085"\w* \w exceeding|strong="H3966"\w* \w pride|strong="H1347"\w* \w and|strong="H8085"\w* conceit, \w his|strong="H8085"\w* overflowing \w arrogance|strong="H1346"\w*. \w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* boasting \w is|strong="H3651"\w* empty.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w let|strong="H3651"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w wail|strong="H3213"\w*; \w let|strong="H3651"\w* them \w wail|strong="H3213"\w* together \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*. \w Moan|strong="H1897"\w* \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* raisin cakes \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w Kir-hareseth|strong="H7025"\w*, \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H5218"\w* utterly \w stricken|strong="H5218"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w fields|strong="H7709"\w* \w of|strong="H4057"\w* \w Heshbon|strong="H2809"\w* \w have|strong="H1471"\w* withered, \w along|strong="H5674"\w* \w with|strong="H3220"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* grapevines \w of|strong="H4057"\w* \w Sibmah|strong="H7643"\w*. \w The|strong="H3588"\w* rulers \w of|strong="H4057"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w have|strong="H1471"\w* \w trampled|strong="H1986"\w* \w its|strong="H3220"\w* choicest \w vines|strong="H1612"\w*, \w which|strong="H1471"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* \w reached|strong="H5060"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w far|strong="H5704"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w Jazer|strong="H3270"\w* \w and|strong="H1471"\w* \w spread|strong="H5203"\w* \w toward|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w desert|strong="H4057"\w*. \w Their|strong="H3588"\w* shoots \w had|strong="H3588"\w* \w spread|strong="H5203"\w* \w out|strong="H5674"\w* \w and|strong="H1471"\w* \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3651"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w weep|strong="H1058"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jazer|strong="H3270"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w vines|strong="H1612"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w Sibmah|strong="H7643"\w*; \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w drench|strong="H7301"\w* \w Heshbon|strong="H2809"\w* \w and|strong="H5307"\w* Elealeh \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w tears|strong="H1832"\w*. Triumphant \w shouts|strong="H1959"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w* silent \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w summer|strong="H7019"\w* \w fruit|strong="H7019"\w* \w and|strong="H5307"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w*.

\w Joy|strong="H8057"\w* \w and|strong="H8057"\w* \w gladness|strong="H8057"\w* \w are|strong="H1524"\w* \w removed|strong="H7673"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* orchard; \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w sings|strong="H7442"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w shouts|strong="H1959"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w*. \w No|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w tramples|strong="H1869"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* grapes \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w winepresses|strong="H3342"\w*; \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* \w put|strong="H7673"\w* \w an|strong="H7673"\w* \w end|strong="H7673"\w* \w to|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* cheering.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w heart|strong="H4578"\w* \w laments|strong="H5921"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w like|strong="H3651"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w harp|strong="H3658"\w*, \w my|strong="H5921"\w* inmost being \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w Kir-heres|strong="H7025"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w appears|strong="H7200"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w high|strong="H1116"\w* \w place|strong="H1116"\w*, \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w wearies|strong="H3811"\w* \w himself|strong="H3808"\w* \w and|strong="H7200"\w* enters \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w* \w to|strong="H3201"\w* \w pray|strong="H6419"\w*, \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w do|strong="H3201"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* good.

\w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w message|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* earlier \w concerning|strong="H1697"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H1696"\w*, “\w In|strong="H8141"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*, \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w hired|strong="H7916"\w* \w worker|strong="H7916"\w* counts \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*, \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*’s \w splendor|strong="H3519"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w become|strong="H3519"\w* \w an|strong="H3068"\w* object \w of|strong="H3068"\w* contempt, \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w people|strong="H3808"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w left|strong="H7605"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w few|strong="H4592"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w feeble|strong="H3808"\w*.”
